enhanced_description: Allison PR is a global integrated marketing and communications consultancy that also offers services and solutions in HR technology and consulting. Specializing in talent management and recruiting, Allison PR helps organizations achieve critical HR business objectives, including accelerating top talent acquisition, enhancing hiring manager productivity, and reducing overall hiring costs. Their services encompass HR consulting, recruitment agency functions, and potentially supporting internal HR initiatives such as collaborative workspaces, company wellness programs, and mental health benefits, leveraging a network across 50 markets.
